title: Outdoor Kitchens & Fire Features
intro: Signature cooking suites, pizza ovens, and custom fire lounges built to withstand the elements.

avgCost.notes: Pricing reflects utilities, appliances, masonry, and custom millwork.

highlights: Appliance packages from Lynx, Wolf, and Blaze
Code-compliant gas, electric, and water routing

faqs.q: Will you coordinate permits and inspections?
faqs.a: Absolutely. We manage permit drawings, utility coordination, and final inspections for gas and electrical scopes.
